channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tennis star Venus Williams marries actor and model Andrea Preti in lavish second wedding at $10 million Florida estate
item.description: The wedding lasted five days and included a bridal shower, pool parties and sports events.

item.title: U.S. stock futures flat, silver gains again as investors hope to start 2026 on a roll
item.description: U.S. stock futures were little changed on Sunday as investors look to end the year on a high note.

item.title: SoftBank has been on the prowl for AI investments — here’s its next target, according to a report
item.description: SoftBank has slowly been increasing exposure to the AI trade.

item.title: The history of the $5.5 million ‘Home Alone’ house—which is going to be remodeled
item.description: The other star of the holiday movie “Home Alone”— the house—is being renovated into a real-life version of the one depicted in the film.

item.title: This hedge-fund veteran who pushed for silver in February now warns of short-term risks
item.description: There are a handful of obstacles to negotiate at the very outset of 2026 but longer-term drivers will soon reassert themselves, claims CAmpbell.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
